Title: Pictorial explanation of the First Five Year Plan (1953-1957) for the development of the national economy of our nation
Designer: General Political Department of the Chinese People's Liberation Army (中国人民解放军总政治部)
Notes: "Pictorial explanation of the First Five Year Plan (1953-1957) for the development of the national economy of our nation" (我国发展国民经济的第一个五年(1953-1957)计划图解) is a series of 12 posters, ca. 1955, possibly incomplete.The 11th sheet, "Improvement of people’s material and cultural living standards within five years" (五年内人民物质文化生活水平的提高), shows eager customers. On the right, estimates are given for increases in labor force; wages; housing; and health care facilities. Below, "Development of cultural and educational undertakings within five years" (五年内文化教育事业的发展), shows a classroom and a cinema.
